item.title: Civic Sage
item.description: Fully deployed (AWS) data service utilising RAG-LLMs & session analysis to improve localised access to UK parliamentary politics.

item.title: Meta-learning Search Engine
item.description: (Private repo) Full-stack meta-learning data application as part of Horizon EU Program enabling interactive ranking/comparison of dataset similarity via statistical analysis.

item.title: TailorApply
item.description: (Private repo) Analysis and tailoring of applications from deeply researched job postings via chain-based LLM systems.

item.title: JPMC Expo Agent-Driven Banking
item.description: (Private repo) 10-week programme by rotating JPMC SWE teams, developing full-stack agent-based banking application for expo to MDs.
